title: Virtual Lecture: El Greco—Ambition and Defiance
title_display: Virtual Lecture: El Greco—Ambition and Defiance
hero_caption: El Greco (Domenikos Theotokopoulos). The Assumption of the Virgin (detail), 1577–79. Gift of Nancy Atwood Sprague in memory of Albert Arnold Sprague.
short_description: Join us virtually and hear from curator Rebecca Long as she traces the iconic career of the artist known simply as El Greco, whose work is featured in the major exhibition El Greco: Ambition and Defiance.
description:
Join us virtually and hear from Rebecca Long, Patrick G. and Shirley W. Ryan Associate Curator of Painting and Sculpture of Europe, as she discusses El Greco: Ambition and Defiance. Discover how El Greco developed his distinctive style and learn about his astounding ambition that drove him to relentlessly pursue success.

To join by phone, dial +1-312-626-6799 (Chicago) or find your local number. The meeting ID is 992 7016 3048.

Questions about Zoom? Find tutorials and resources here.
